game.name: Piece by Piece
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Piece by Piece는 각 스테이지가 퍼즐 조각으로 구성된 ‘진정한’ 퍼즐 플랫폼 게임입니다. 조각을 연결하거나 분리하면서 100개의 손수 제작된 레벨을 공략하고, 새 테마와 메커닉도 발견해 보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Piece by Piece is a literal puzzle platformer where each level is fragmented into puzzle pieces. Clear each puzzle by connecting and unconnected each piece to make your way through each of our 100 handcrafted levels. Discover new themes and mechanics along the way!
